rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming entry area with traditional Chettinad elements like intricate carvings and warm color palettes.
rooms.vastu: Optimal for entrance to attract positive energy.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious area combining the kitchen and living space with a fusion of modern amenities and traditional Chettinad aesthetics. Features include an open-plan layout, ample natural light from windows on the courtyard side, and built-in storage.
rooms.vastu: South-eastern positioning for prosperity and balance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom designed as the master suite with traditional elements, ensuring privacy and comfort. Includes an en-suite bathroom.
rooms.vastu: North-western placement for health and restful energy.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom for a family member or guest, maintaining similar design language as the master bedroom.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A smaller guest room for occasional visitors, with minimalistic design and traditional Chettinad accents.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated space for entertainment; designed with acoustic considerations and ambient lighting. Suitable for a family of four.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A core element of the design providing natural ventilation and light. Includes landscaped garden with native plants.
rooms.vastu: Centrally located to maintain balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small space for laundry and storage, integrated into the design with traditional finishes.
rooms.vastu: North-eastern corner to enhance knowledge and success.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Comprehensive bathroom space attached to the master bedroom, incorporating modern fixtures with traditional elements.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Stately door with traditional carvings leading into the entrance hall.

openings.name: Courtyard Windows
openings.description: Large windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Sliding Glass Doors
openings.description: Seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.

openings.name: Home Theater Door
openings.description: Dedicated door for privacy during home theater sessions.
